Uses of Class
gametools.Item

    • Uses of Item in gametools

      Subclasses of Item in gametools 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sprite
      Used to represent game objects or characters.
      Fields in gametools declared as Item 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Item Sprite.UNDEFINED_AREA
      An empty area to represent no movement area being previously set.
      Methods in gametools that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item Sprite.getMovementArea()
      Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Item.isCompletelyWithin(Item item)
      Checks if the object is completely within (no points outside) a specified object.
      boolean Item.isWithin(Item item)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another item using rectangular collision.
      void Sprite.lockMovementArea(Item area)
      Defines the area the sprite can move inside.
      void SpriteGroup.setRemoveArea(Item area)
      Defines the area the sprites can move inside.
